name: Magnetic Rocks
description:
Magnetic Rocks! Quick help:

  • Click/Drag rocks or pins to move them.
  • Re-create the Molecule in the top left.
  • Click the Scanning Button to compare the graph you made against the target..
  • Only rocks under the glass will be checked.
  • Use the Pin to hold a rock in place.
  • You can play any level, no restrictions yet. Feel free to progress when you feel like it.
  • There are Freeplay levels at the end.

Created for GMTK Game Jam 2021! Most graphics were handdrawn for this jam. Audio from freesound.org.

In this game, you will have to re-create a given molecule made out of different rocks. These rocks will link to each other if they get close, and you can pull them apart to disconnect them again. All rocks have a maximum number of connections they can make. Click the Scanning button to check your graph against the target.
